CPD-General.name: Chicago Police Department
CPD-General.description: General CPD stream, scans the 13 zones.

CW6.name: CPD Citywide 1, 5, 6
CW6.description: Listen to this stream during special events, protests, or for high-priority calls being dispatched. Citywide 1 is for traffic, Marine Unit, mass transit, etc. Citywide 5 and 6 are alternate channels.

Z2.name: CPD Zone 2 - District 19
Z2.description: 19th District - Town Hall: Serving Uptown, south Lincoln Square, North Center, and Lakeview (including Boystown).

Z3.name: CPD Zone 3 - Districts 12 and 14
Z3.description: Near West Side, Wicker Park, Ukranian Village, West Town, Logan Square, Bucktown, UIC areas.

Z4.name: CPD Zone 4 - Districts 1 and 18
Z4.description: 1st District-Central..18th District-Near North.. Zone cover Downtown Chicago, Lake Shore Drive, Mag Mile, Navy Pier, Central Detention

Z5.name: CPD Zone 5 - District 2
Z5.description: 2nd District - Wentworth: Serving Douglas, Oakland, Grand Boulevard, Kenwood, Washington Park, and Hyde Park.

Z9.name: CPD Zone 9 - Districts 5 and 22
Z9.description: 5th District.. Calumet / Area South.. 22nd District  Morgan Park

Z10.name: CPD Zone 10 - Districts 10 and 11
Z10.description: 10th District - Ogden: Serving North Lawndale, South Lawndale, and the Lower West Side; 11th District - Harrison: Serving West Garfield Park, East Garfield Park, and the southern half of Humboldt Park.

Z11.name: CPD Zone 11 - Districts 20 and 24
Z11.description: Dist. 20 and 24, serving the far North side of Chicago, including community areas of Rodgers Park, West Ridge, and Edgewater

Z12.name: CPD Zone 12 - Districts 15 and 25
Z12.description: Dist. 15 and 25, serving the far West side of Chicago, including community areas of Austin, Hermosa, and Belmont Cragin.

Z13.name: CPD Zone 13 - District 9
Z13.description: 9th District - Deering: Serving Bridgeport, McKinley Park, Brighton Park, New City, and Gage Park.

CFD-Fire.name: CFD Fire - Main and Englewood, Citywide
CFD-Fire.description: Chicago Fire Department (P25 Digital UHF) - MAIN/north & ENGLEWOOD/south, Fire Alarm Offices, including CITYWIDE Fire, radio system. CITYWIDE FIRE is also on the Chicago Fire & EMS Feed! (WPSG 985)  www.ChicagoFD.org

CFD-EMS.name: CFD EMS - Main and Englewood, EMS Command, CTA Fire. Citywide Fire, Joint Ops
CFD-EMS.description: Chicago Fire Department (UHF) CTA-Fire, CITYWIDE Fire, Fire Tac., Joint Ops. Also in (P25 Digital-UHF)  EMS-MAIN/north, EMS-ENGLEWOOD/south & UHF-EMS Command. www.ChicagoFD.org
